articles.title: Mozambique's former finance minister to be extradited to the US - News24
articles.description: Mozambique's former finance minister Manuel Chang, jailed in South Africa since 2018, will be extradited to the US, the Gauteng High Court in Johannesburg ruled.
articles.content:
• Mozambique's former finance minister Manuel Chang will be extradited to the US, not to Maputo.
  • This was in terms of a ruling by the Gauteng High Court in Johannesburg on Wednesday.
